about.description_1: Launched in 2015, Exclusive is South Asia's premier online shopping marketplace with an active presence in Bangladesh. Supported by a wide range of tailored marketing, data and service solutions, Exclusive has 10,500 sellers and 300 brands and serves 3 million customers across the region.
about.description_2: Exclusive has more than 1 Million products to offer, growing at a very fast pace. Exclusive offers a diverse assortment in categories ranging from consumer.

return_details.title: Return & Refund Policy
return_details.intro: We want you to be fully satisfied with your purchase. If for any reason you are not, you can return your order within 30 days of delivery.
return_details.eligibility_1: Items must be returned within 30 days of the delivery date.
return_details.eligibility_2: Products must be unused, in the same condition you received them, and in the original packaging.
return_details.eligibility_3: Some items cannot be returned for hygiene reasons (e.g., undergarments, cosmetics).
return_details.eligibility_4: Proof of purchase (receipt or order confirmation) is required for all returns.
return_details.process_1: Contact our support team to initiate the return.
return_details.process_2: We will provide you with a return shipping label and instructions.
return_details.process_3: Pack the item securely in its original packaging and attach the return label.
return_details.process_4: Ship the item back to us within 7 days after receiving the label.
return_details.refunds_intro: Once we receive and inspect your returned item, we will notify you of the approval or rejection of your refund:
return_details.refunds_1: Approved refunds will be processed to your original payment method within 5-10 business days.
return_details.refunds_2: Shipping fees are non-refundable unless the return is due to our error (wrong or defective item).
return_details.exchanges_intro: If you wish to exchange an item for a different size or color, please initiate a return first. Once your return is processed, you may place a new order for the replacement item.
